item_category: The Doro 7030 is an exceptionally stylish and easy to use clamshell feature phone. In addition to easy calling and messaging, the 7030 enables you to use WhatsApp and Facebook over WiFi and 4G. The 2.8" screen and the widely separated, high contrast keys make everything you see and do all very easy, including taking great photos and videos with the 3MP camera. Other features include enhanced audio with HD voice, easy navigation, a great battery life, as well as reassuring safety features such as support for Response by Doro with GPS positioning.
